spec.init: Initialize Speculator in the current project
spec.new: Start a new feature workspace and draft requirements
spec.fix: Create a bug fix feature from reproduction steps
spec.next: Check feature status and suggest the next step
spec.research: Gather context and validate assumptions before planning
spec.plan: Create implementation plan bridging current state to requirements
spec.tasks: Break the plan into an executable task checklist
spec.implement: Execute tasks in a recursive loop
spec.clarify: Update the spec when requirements change, assess downstream impact
